content: {"Status":"FSR-API-02-06-00","ResultInfo":{"page":"1","per_page":"3","total_count":"3"},"Message":"Ok. Firm Requirements found","Data":[{"Effective Date":"26/04/2016","No CBTL business unless registered":"The firm must not carry on any activity that would constitute consumer buy-to-let mortgage business as defined in Part 3 of the Mortgage Credit Directive Order 2015 (SI 910/2015) unless registered as a consumer buy-to-let mortgage firm","Requirement Reference":"OR-0131728","Financial Promotions Requirement":"FALSE"},{"Effective Date":"25/04/2016","Not permitted to canvass off trade premises":"The firm is not permitted to canvass regulated borrower-lender-supplier agreements or regulated consumer hire agreements off trade premises","Requirement Reference":"OR-0131653","Financial Promotions Requirement":"FALSE"},{"Effective Date":"06/11/2023","Financial Promotions for own firm, ARs and other members of the group":"This firm can approve its own financial promotions as well as those of members of its wider group and, in certain circumstances, those of its appointed representatives.","Requirement Reference":"OR-0229266","Financial Promotions Requirement":"TRUE"}]}
